00015 const string FieldException::errorString [] = {   "Type undefined",                               // 0
00016                                                   "Unknown item",                                 // 1
00017                                                   "Unknown combo type",                           // 2
00018                                                   "Not a valid combo object",                     // 3
00019                                                   "Invalid conversion from string to boolean",    // 4
00020                                                   "Size of combo field is invalid"  };            // 5

00024   
00025 FieldException::FieldException( int errorNumber )
00026 {
00027   error = errorNumber;
00028   fieldType = "UNKNOWN";
00029   fieldLabel = "UNKNOWN";
00030 };
00031

00036 FieldException::FieldException( int errorNumber, string type, string label )
00037 {
00038   error = errorNumber;
00039   fieldType = type;
00040   fieldLabel = label;
00041 };

00049 FieldException::FieldException( int errorNumber, string type, string label, string info )
00050 {
00051   error = errorNumber;
00052   fieldType = type;
00053   fieldLabel = label;
00054   infoString = info;
00055 };

00061 FieldException::FieldException( const FieldException& fieldEx )
00062 {
00063   error = fieldEx.error;
00064   fieldType = fieldEx.fieldType;
00065   fieldLabel = fieldEx.fieldLabel;
00066   infoString = fieldEx.infoString;
00067 }

00151 
00152 const char* FieldException::what() const throw()
00153 {
00154   string tmp = "Field exception: " + errorString[error] + " in field with label: " + fieldLabel + ", of type: " + fieldType + ".\n" + infoString; 
00155   return tmp.c_str();
00156 }
